summary: A wife and mother is consumed by the thought that her husband's co-worker is trying to win him away from her and their family.
cast: Susan Sarandon|Sam Neill|Emily Blunt|Charles 'Bud' Tingwell|William McInnes|Georgie Parker|Terry Norris|Joanna Hunt-Prokhovnik|Lauren Mikkor|Heather Mitchell|Jill Forster|Joelene Crnogorac|Geneviève Picot|Carolyn Bock|Alethea McGrath|Amanda Douge|Eleanor Caspar|Eboni Rutherford|John Sadler|Cassie Gardner|Barry Friedlander|Emerald Tanner|Fleur Murphy|Natalie Eleftheriadis|Emma Clair Ford|Peter Booth|De'Arne Devereux|Tayla Allen|Kathy Damousi-Vinecombe|Myles Vinecombe
title: Irresistible
